titleStmt.title: An answer, to a little book call'd Protestancy to be embrac'd or, A new and infallible method to reduce Romanists from popery to Protestancy
titleStmt.author: Con, Alexander.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Con. Cf. Wing, Clancy.
Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
